com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3.extenders

Class PropertyExtender.File

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spazedog.lib.rootfw3.extenders.PropertyExtender.File
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtenderGroup
    Enclosing class:
    PropertyExtender

    public static class PropertyExtender.File
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExtenderGroup
    This class is used to work with property files, like /system/build.prop.
    Note that this implements the ExtenderGroup interface, which means that it does not allow anything outside RootFW to create an instance of it. Use RootFW.property(String) to retrieve an instance.
